Description

A 3D flight simulator with a real life component!

History

The asteroid game was initially inspired by the Oculus game Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes. In that game, the communication between players was strongly discouraged, as one of the players could not perform the other player's task. Seeking to emulate this experiece, we started working on an oculus-based game. However, when Oculus dropped support for the headset model that we had, we had to get creative, switching to Arduinos (far more fickle than the Oculus Rift). This is the end product!
